title: Voxic Shock 1.4: John Julius Norwich
author: VD
content_html: In this week’s Voxic Shock podcast, I speak with the historian John Julius Norwich about the Byzantine Empire, the Crusades, the great historians of history, and the outlook for the secular West meeting the challenge of Islamic expansion.
content_text:
In this week’s
Voxic Shock podcast
,  I speak with the historian John Julius Norwich about the Byzantine Empire, the Crusades, the great historians of history, and the outlook for the secular West meeting the challenge of Islamic expansion.
